experience: You and Burt both know Michael Jones, Josh Stomel, and 26 others

Transamerica Retirement Solutions (Transamerica) is a leading provider of customized retirement plan solutions for small- to large-sized organizations. My contributions include, but are not limited to:Coding, testing, identifying, implementing and documenting technical solutions to business challenges utilizing web and related technologies.Translating user requirements into overall solution architecture for complex technical solutions.Designing an internal application to read, search and modify local XML files utilizing Node WebKit, HTML5, jQuery, AngularJS, and Bootstrap.Creating a clean and intuitive UI allowing users to quickly understand and manipulate Document Generation Logic to meet constantly evolving business requirements.Providing broad technical knowledge, analysis and development of end-to-end solutions and making recommendations towards simplification and efficiency of the business and technology environment.Developing, testing and maintaining .NET applications to support multiple TRS departments.Creating and modifying SQL stored procedures, views and XML logic for testing, development, staging and production environments to ensure efficient and accurate document generation for end users.

RentApp is a civic app built in collaboration with the City of Santa Monica providing a wide range of tools to residents looking for affordable and stable housing. The application has a user account management portal, several geolocation and map search features and other tenant focused features enabling quick and easy communication and searchability.Some of my contributions include:Creating API / View Controllers, Views, Model Classes, Database Tables, SQL Stored Procs, Reusable JS files, AJAX Functions, Angular Modules, C# Service Interfaces, etc. to meet the business objectives of the product owner.Creating intuitive mobile responsive views using AngularJS, Javascript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3 and Bootstrap 3.0.Developing Search Filters that can be stored within a profile allowing users to manage multiple searches with varying parameters. Creating the Home Page which allows users to view listings based on their current location and showcases featured properties.Developed the Contact page using SendGrid's SMTP API enabling users to message a specific department and storing that message in the corresponding database table.Created editable Blogs views that allows users to comment and see blogs by category. I utilized SQL Foreign Keys to provide a seamless user experience. I also developed User Profile pages allowing users to sign up, edit their profile and access their saved listing searches.Developed a property listings view that shows each listing on a map when hovered over and triggers a Google Map infowindow with listing info that links to the listings details view. Utilized cookies to allow users to compare multiple listings.Incorporated Yelp’s API to allow users to search for local points of interest near any listing and automatically display nearby schools and restaurants, complete with images, contact info and Yelp ratings.Created mobile responsive Navigation Bar in order to improve accessibility and functionality of the application.

I was initially brought on to the team for a 3 month contract to build out an MVP for RentApp which was used to garner interest from cities looking to make it easier for residents to utilize their rent control resources. During that time the City of Santa Monica expressed interest and I was promoted to stay on the project and continue developing the product.Worked under the supervision of a lead developer to design, build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable C# code to meet the business requirements of the product owner and the City of Santa Monica. Front-end development with AngularJS, HTML, CSS3, JavaScript and jQuery to create a familiar user experience similar to that of Zillow or Trulia.Developed new JavaScript modules and incorporated existing ones for testing purposes and to maximize code reusability.Created testable Stored Procedures, Joins, Foreign/ Primary Keys and  DB Diagrams with SQL Server 2014 to create, retrieve, update and delete data from RentApp users and administration.

Drive your creativity forward with Wiredrive. Wiredrive is the cloud media sharing service of choice for the world’s largest advertising, entertainment and consumer marketing companies. Production, sales and marketing teams trust Wiredrive to simplify the logistics of creativity and securely manage their most important media assets. We bring people and media together in a shared space where hard work and great ideas blossom into amazing things. Wiredrive is a fast-growing, profitable and privately-owned company founded in 2000. Its offices are located in the media capitals of Los Angeles, New York, San Francisco and London.

ZipRecruiter was founded in 2010 to simplify the process of hiring. With ZipRecruiter, you can post a job to 100+ leading job boards & social networks with one click and manage all applicants through a simple online interface. With a central location for finding, screening, and tracking applicants, ZipRecruiter empowers employers and recruiters to make the best hiring decisions without bulky or expensive software.ZipRecruiter also delivers millions of daily job alerts to job seekers and allows them to search hundreds of job boards simultaneously. We also distribute their resume to thousands of hiring managers via our resume database.See the article below if you are interesting in learning about what makes us unique and why ZipRecruiter continuously delivers the best ROI in the industry.http://pando.com/2014/07/03/bootstrapped-and-massively-profitable-ziprecruiter-steps-out-of-the-shadows-to-reveal-its-true-might/

In the Existing Accounts role, I specialized in optimizing job ad performance and candidate acquisition for ZipRecruiter's existing accounts, Using a consultative sales approach, I was able to strategically improve my client's hiring strategies and maximize their campaign results, allowing me to consistently exceed my monthly sales goals.My immediate success in this role enabled me to become the first salesperson from Existing Accounts to be promoted to an Account Executive position in just 3 months.

•	Developed innovative business plans and sales strategies for vertical markets.•	Secured accounts with public schools, local government, and non-profit organizations.•	Cultivated relationships with key players, creating ongoing and mutually beneficial referral systems.•	Worked closely with administrative staff, optimizing internal systems, policies, and procedures.•	Realized substantial revenue growth my first fiscal year and consistent growth subsequent years.•	Maintained up-to-date knowledge of industry, key demographics, and competitive landscape. •	Coached and mentored staff through constructive feedback and sales and customer service skill development.•	Increased customer loyalty and maximized revenues through customized sales solutions.•	Negotiated contracts with suppliers to minimize costs and control inventory.•	Developed marketing campaigns and negotiated co-op advertising arrangements with vendors.•	Executed strategic brand-building events and expanded product offerings to increase consumer awareness.
Business Administration; International Management and Marketing

JB Dela Cruz
Senior Inside Sales Manager at ZipRecruiter
December 16, 2015, JB managed Burt directly

I had the pleasure of managing Burt directly for a few months before promoting him from a Existing Accounts Executive to a New Accounts Executive. What is impressive about Burt that continues to stand out to me is that he had little to no B2B experience and was able to soak in everything that I taught him and apply that to his day-to-day operation. In doing so I was able to promote him faster than anyone that I have ever promoted before. Burt's relaxed, yet confident demeanor on the phone allowed him to excel as well as grow within our ever changing environment. It goes without saying that Burt was a huge asset to our sales organization. I am extremely grateful to have had the opportunity to manage him and can say with the utmost confidence that he will continue to be a great asset in any sales organization that has the opportunity to hire him.

I had the opportunity to work with Clay and can say, without hesitation, that he is one of the smartest and focused people I have had the pleasure to work with. He treats everyday as a welcome challenge and challenges his colleagues to be the best as well. His technical knowledge is unsurpassed and he is one of the few people I have met that can translate that to people in a digestible manner. In addition to consistently being one of the top producers at Wiredrive, he continually created amazing assets and content for internal trainings and reference. He did all that not because he was ever asked to, but because he truly wants everyone he works with to have the tools they need to succeed. I am very grateful to have met Clay and I am excited to see what the future holds for him. Any organization would be lucky to have a Clay Burton on their team.

Parag Shah
Strategic Partnerships Manager at Casper
February 26, 2016, Parag was senior to Burt but didn’t manage directly

It's hard to find a starting point about someone as multi-talented as Parag. In my experience, most individuals have one or two things that they truly are passionate and excel at. That is not the case with Parag. He is one of the most driven salespeople I have ever known, an excellent leader, an amazing communicator and above all else eager to help. Though Parag was senior to me, he managed a different team than I was on. When I started he made sure to include me on every sales and product training he was running with his own team. Above and beyond. In addition to the trainings he worked his butt off creating incredibly valuable assets/ content in conjunction with the marketing team. If I ever had any questions or ideas on how to improve any of our current processes he acted as a mentor and an advocate to make improvements. Whether is was some internal asset or changes that could improve our SalesForce, he stepped up to the plate and made it happen.The way Parag approaches work and life is inspiring. He is one of the friendliest and hardest working people I've met and combined with his natural soft skills of knowing how to get people excited about things and trust him, I can say without hesitation that he will be an asset to whatever organization is lucky to have him.
